content.html: This company called @Microsoft runs this package manager called @nuget. They host a curl package there, that was last updated in 2013 and now contains **68** documented vulnerabilities. But there is apparently no way I can report this or make them act on this.
content.value:
This company called @Microsoft runs this package manager called @nuget.

They host a curl package there, that was last updated in 2013 and now contains **68** documented vulnerabilities.

But there is apparently no way I can report this or make them act on this.
